help:
Type the following prompts for more information or guidance:

    General commands:
  • creator: learn more about the creator
  • repo: get the github repository link
  • features: see a full list of features
  • updates: see future updates and improvements coming soon
  • example: see an example of a prompt and response
  • copy: copy the last ai-generated code block in the chat
  • save: save the chat to workspace
  • clear: clear the chat from workspace
    • Switch chat type:
  • explain: switch to the code explanations chat
  • refine: switch to the code refinement chat
  • debug: switch to the code debugging chat
  • convert: switch to the code conversion chat
creator:
